 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְחַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==trust== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idiot, 126</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 193</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ra—âƒu***</u></abbr>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***have indulgence, permission***); — 

**Hithpe\`el** ***set one's trust*** upon (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַל‎</span> of deity) ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִתְרְחִ֫צוּ‎</span> [[Dan.3.28|Dan 3:28]].
